content.question: This question is designed to test your ability to work with and understand historical documents. Write an essay that: Provides an appropriate, explicitly stated thesis that directly addresses all parts of the question and does NOT simply restate the question. Discusses a majority of the documents individually and specifically. Demonstrates understanding of the basic meaning of a majority of the documents. Supports the thesis with appropriate interpretations of a majority of the documents. Analyzes point of view or bias in at least three documents. Analyzes the documents by explicitly grouping them in at least three appropriate ways. ​​​​​​​Analyze the arguments and practices concerning religious toleration from the sixteenth to the eighteenth century.
